hero.description: Senior Backend Engineer specializing in distributed systems, serverless architectures, and high-throughput data pipelines.

originStory.title: Origin Story: The GeForce Analogy
originStory.content: "In 2018, I tried GeForce Now and realized my flimsy laptop was running a AAA game on a rig hundreds of miles away. The latency was negligible, the power was immense. That's when it clicked: computing isn't about the box in front of you, it's about the pipe and the powerhouse at the other end. I've been building those powerhouses ever since."

experience.description: Architected a serverless microservices backend handling 50k+ concurrent connections. Optimized DynamoDB access patterns reducing latency by 40%.
Designed the CI/CD pipeline for machine learning model deployments. Managed EC2 fleet auto-scaling for neural network training jobs.
Implemented real-time data ingestion services. Worked on high-throughput event streaming using Kafka and Apache Flink.

interests.title: Precision Cooking
interests.subtitle: Sous Vide Enthusiast
interests.description: Applying the same fault-tolerant logic to steak as I do to servers. Consistent temperature control ensures 99.99% reliability on medium-rare outcomes.
